title: Japan citizen shot dead in Bangladesh, second foreigner killed this week
text:
Published By: Reuters - World news - Today 
DHAKA (Reuters) - A Japanese citizen was shot dead in Bangladesh on Saturday, police said, the second killing of a foreign national in the S...
